Material used.Description: The experiment was conducted using the SH-SY5Y cell line.

Readout description.Result Description: Decreased levels of PINK1 protein expression in cells with the c.1984A>G variant.
Loss of PINK1 protein expression in cells with the c.1735C>T variant.

Biological replicates.Description: Three biological replicates were performed for each variant.

Technical replicates.Description: Each sample was run in duplicate.

Basic positive control.Description: Wild-type PINK1 cDNA was used as a positive control.

Basic negative control.Description: Empty vector was used as a negative control.

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: t-test was used for statistical analysis.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: Protein expression greater than 100% relative to wild-type.

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: Protein expression less than 50% relative to wild-type.

Material used.Description: The experiment was conducted using the HEK293 cell line.

Readout description.Result Description: Cells with the c.204T>C variant showed reduced kinase activity compared to wild-type.

Biological replicates.Description: Two biological replicates were performed for each variant.

Basic positive control.Description: Wild-type PINK1 cDNA was used as a positive control.

Basic negative control.Description: Empty vector was used as a negative control.

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: ANOVA was used for statistical analysis.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: Kinase activity greater than 80% relative to wild-type.

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: Kinase activity less than 50% relative to wild-type.
